executeJob(address[],bytes[],bytes[]).details: Use this function to execute Jobs.Only Orchestrator can call this function.

params._strategyProvidedData: are the encoded parameters sent on the time of creation or execution of action in orchestrator according to the strategy.
params._targetAddresses: are the addresses of the contracts on which the jobs needs to be executed.
params._userProvidedData: are the calldatas that are provided by the user at the registration time.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerJob(bytes[],address[],string,str.details: Use this function to register jobs.

params._ipfsForJobDetails: is the ipfs hash containing job details like the interval for job execution.
params._name: should be the name of the job.
params._targetAddresses: are the addresses of the contracts on which the jobs needs to be executed.
params._userProvidedData: are the calldatas that are provided by the user at the registration time.

registerJobAndDepositGas(bytes[],address.details: Use this function to register jobs and deposit gas in one callSend the amount of gas that is needed to be deposited as msg.value.

params._ipfsForJobDetails: is the ipfs hash containing job details like the interval for job execution.
params._name: is the name of the job.
params._targetAddresses: are the addresses of the contracts on which the jobs needs to be executed.
params._userProvidedData: are the calldatas that are provided by the user at the registration time.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setJobState(bytes32,uint256).details: Use this function to pause or unpause a job

params._jobHash: is the keccak of encoded parameters and target addresses
params._toggle: pass 1 to pause the job and pass 2 to unpause the job

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawGas(uint256,address).details: Use this function to withdraw gas associated to this vaultOnly creator of this vault can call this function

params._amount: is the amount of ether in wei that creator of this contract wants to pull out
params.to: is the address at which the creator wants to pull the deposited ether out

jobState.details: The mapping of jobState has 3 possiblities      1) 0 means not registered      2) 1 means registered and paused      3) 2 means unpaused and registered (active)
